1.0.name: wordpress/better-archives-widget
1.0.description: This plugin will add a new widget to the Appearance -> widgets area called "custom archives widget". It allows you to display links to your archive pages in any widgetized area of your website. The difference with the default WordPress archives widget is that it groups the links to monthly archives by year (also links), and adds a spiffy accordion effect to reveal the links to monthly archives when you hover over a year.
